officialTitle: Taiwan Cancer Moonshot Project: 1. Next-generation Pathway of Taiwan Cancer Precision Medicine (Subjective Aim 1- Taiwan Cancer Moonshot Project); 2. Development of Novel Treatments for Major Diseases (Subproject 5 - Multiomic Big Data-based Intelligent Navigation System for Precision Oncology)
conditions: Malignant Neoplasm of Body of Stomach in Situ

eligibilityCriteria:
